snippet.title: Animus Toil | Reveal Trailer (Game Boy, PC)
snippet.description:
UNCOVER THE TRUTH.

Introducing #AnimusToil, an experimental puzzle-adventure game for Game Boy and PC, launching on December 22nd, 2021.

When two explorers find their way into an illusive temple, cursed by an evil wizard, they find themselves trapped in a dynamic, yet parallel path towards their own fates. Who exactly is Somnus? Why is the temple cursed? What is the secret behind the mysterious artifacts? And how does this tale all tie into the future of our humanity?

https://mindsetmakers.itch.io/animus-toil

#gameboy #indie #indiegame
